name: lavalink server
description: A Heroku app to deploy your own Lavalink server.

PASS.description: Set this for authorization for your lavalink server. default: youshallnotpass

APP_NAME.description: The heroku app name to keep alive retype the 'App name'. Leave empty to disable internal pinging.

JAVA_TOOL_OPTIONS.description: Isso define a RAM para o máximo (não altere) esta variável, caso apresente algum erro diminua para `-Xmx495 -Xss254k`
